<@U11HH3P7Y> Is someone looking into the stability of the CI? The false positive rate of failure seems to be extremely high

yes, we are closely morning builds and observed behave tests are failing consistently.. Chris suggested to disable behave tests for time being in CI. We will re-enable them after tests are stabilized.
Is there some place that CI status is posted? Not knowing whether build failures are expected or not is difficult to deal with
yes we are sending patch status (including build result) to <#C11SL9YDV|fabric-ci-status>
